org.beyene.jcurry.function.wrap

Interface CommonExecutable<T,E extends java.lang.Exception>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - return type
    E - exception that is thrown by method call, if no exception is thrown specifiy any unchecked exception type e. g. RuntimeException
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConcreteExecutable

    public interface CommonExecutable<T,E extends java.lang.Exception>
    Represents a function that can be executed as is. Can be a static method that doesn't need an object to be invoked on, a ordinary method or a constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T call(java.lang.Object... args)
      Calls function with given parameter list.
      java.lang.Class<E> getExceptionType()
      Returns type of exception that may be thrown when call is invoked.

    • Method Detail

      • call

        T call(java.lang.Object... args)
throws E extends java.lang.Exception
        Calls function with given parameter list.
        Parameters:
        args - method parameter
        Returns:
        result of underlying function
        Throws:
        E - exception to be thrown
        CommonExecutableException - is thrown the common executable is misconfigured
        E extends java.lang.Exception

      • getExceptionType

        java.lang.Class<E> getExceptionType()
        Returns type of exception that may be thrown when call is invoked.
        Returns:
        class of exception
